file_content.text: You'll have to go into their base after it. Hit those sons of Hutts before they know we're coming.
Do we know anything about the pirates or their operations that I can use?
What should I expect going in?
This sounds like something I could do for a few more credits.
I hope there's hazard pay.
You'll get them. I'll see to it personally.
You can count on me.
That's the spirit!
That datapad puts the pirate base inside a huge system of ice caverns not far from here.
Half the scum in the galaxy will be in there.
Chief Engineer Arim and a squad of Talz will be on your heels. Once the pirates are down, Arim will secure the Null Cannon for transport.
It'll be the mother of all fights! Good luck.
The Force was with us, Admiral. The power core is secure, and I've got a datapad with the location of the pirate base.
Havoc Squad reporting, sir. The power core is secure, and we've recovered a datapad with coordinates for the pirate base.
I've got your power core and a datapad with the location of the pirate hideout, Admiral. Anything else while I'm here?
You made quick work of that motherless space trash! Well done!
Now our troops can take the fight to them!
I hate to interrupt, but the data suggests these components were from the ancillary, not main, power core. That's... bad.
We still kept part of the Null Cannon out of the pirates' hands. It can't be catastrophic.
How bad?
Worst-case scenario? The pirates already have enough of the weapon to make it operational.
What do we do now?
We panic? The pirates probably have the Null Cannon operational by now.
What else can go wrong?
So... you probably don't want to hear that the pirates have probably completed the Null Cannon, then.
We can't leave our best weapon against the Empire in the hands of pirate scum!
